snippet: Andy Chen, chief executive of Aspiro, the parent company of the Swedish streaming music service Tidal, has stepped down, and about a dozen employees were laid off.
abstract: Aspiro chief executive Andy Chen steps down just under month after company being acquired by Project Panther, investment vehicle controlled by Jay Z; is parent company of streaming music service Tidal, which says Peter Tonstad will be interim chief executive.
lead_paragraph: Andy Chen, chief executive of Aspiro, the parent company of the Swedish streaming music service Tidal, has stepped down, and about a dozen employees were laid off.

headline.main: Chief Leaves Music Service Taken Over by Jay Z
headline.print_headline: Chief Leaves Music Service Taken Over by Jay Z
